newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: TIBS unit forms two investment companies.
newsitem.headline: TIBS unit forms two investment companies.

text.p: Trans-Island Bus Services Ltd said on Wednesday it had set up two new investment companies through its wholly-owned subsidiary, TIBS Investment Pte Ltd.

The two companies, TIBS Capital and TIBS Leasing, would act as investment companies for possible ventures into the motor vehicle leasing and hiring business, it said in a statement to the Stock Exchange of Singapore.
Both subsidiaries had authorised share capitals of Singapore $1 million divided into 1 million ordinary shares at S$1.00 each. The shares are held by TIBS Investment, it said.
